instructions.js File Reference

Detailed Description

Instructions for Creature class.

This file extends the Creature class with more instructions; the more instructions, the smarter the creature is.

Note:
built-in commands:
  • still: be still
  • rturn/left/right/backward: turns
  • hide: invisible
